name: The Purple Mist in the Swamp...

imgDesc.text: Asipattravana Swamp is the perennial target of corruptive forces, and is blanketed by a dangerous purple mist.

<color=#ffe14b>Sorush</color> can use her power to awaken the power of Khvarena that flows within the <color=#ffe14b>thorny branches</color> .
After using this power to disperse the purple mist, the manifestation of defilement within will make itself known...

The defiled entities that lie concealed within the bog are the source of the purple mist. Only by destroying them can the mist be parted.
Normal attacks do not work against them, and only the <color=#ffe14b>power of the Nirodha Fruits</color> can completely purify them.
